name: Shape Shooter (introtogamesproduction)
description:
Shape Shooter is a Vertical Scrolling Shooter Game, available on both PC & Android with inspiration by popular rhythm and classic arcade games. The player will battle endless waves of shapes where they must use the appropriate bolt which is the same colour as the enemy to destroy them!

This addicting casual game is easy to pick up but hard to put down! With its simple yet entertaining gameplay loop and bright neon inspired visuals. Try it free today!

What’s your score?

Controls

PC:

  • Movement – WASD
  • Fire Blue Bolt – Left mouse click
  • Fire Red Bolt – Right mouse click

 

Android:

  • Movement – Tilt controls
  • Fire Blue Bolt – Press down on left side of screen
  • Fire Red Bolt – Press down on right side of screen
  • Pause Menu – Android right button

Credits

Developer – Corey Schmid

Studio Producer – Ann Stevens

Studio Director – Justin Carter
